snippet: The mayor of Houston and Jeff Van Gundy have expressed concern over a Texas high school association’s decision not to reschedule the state semifinal game of a school whose players observe the Sabbath.
abstract: Texas high school athletic association is facing pressure from the mayor of Houston and criticism from a former NBA coach over its handling of an Orthodox Jewish day school that is no longer scheduled to play its boys state semifinal basketball game because the players observe the Sabbath.
lead_paragraph: The mayor of Houston and Jeff Van Gundy have expressed concern over a Texas high school association’s decision not to reschedule the state semifinal game of a school whose players observe the Sabbath.

headline.seo: Texas Association Criticized for Ordering Jewish School Out of Playoffs
headline.main: Texas Association Criticized for Ruling on Jewish Team
